title: FS: Lot of 36 T206 Chicago Cubs Lot w/ Mid-Higher Grade Cards FINAL PRICE DROP 4/25
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 36 T206 Chicago Cubs Lot w/ Mid-Higher Grade Cards FINAL PRICE DROP 4/25
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of 36 T206 Chicago Cubs cards for sale. This is a near complete team set, missing only the Tinker (hands on knees).  These are mostly nicer mid to higher grade cards, with several very difficult front/back combos.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards from listing for easier reading):

Chance (yellow portrait) SGC 3.5 Sweet Caporal 350/25 Very Tough Combo, undergraded - $550
Lundgren (Chicago) Very Tough Partial "N" Variant, Perfect Centering PSA 2 - $1250
Overall (portrait) SGC 4.5 - $275
Pfeffer (SGC 4) - $200

Pm sent 
Tinkers 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Replied. Mark em sold. Thanks!
